verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Job \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*,

No doubt \w but|strong="H3588"\w* ye \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3824"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w inferior|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3824"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*: \w Yea|strong="H1571"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* knoweth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w such|strong="H3644"\w* \w things|strong="H3644"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* these?

\w I|strong="H7121"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H6662"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w laughingstock|strong="H7814"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*, \w I|strong="H7121"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* God, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*: \w The|strong="H7121"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w laughingstock|strong="H7814"\w*.

\w In|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w thought|strong="H6248"\w* \w of|strong="H7272"\w* \w him|strong="H3559"\w* \w that|strong="H7272"\w* is at \w ease|strong="H7600"\w* there is contempt \w for|strong="H3559"\w* misfortune; \w It|strong="H3559"\w* is \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w them|strong="H3559"\w* whose \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* slippeth.

\w The|strong="H3027"\w* tents \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w robbers|strong="H7703"\w* \w prosper|strong="H7951"\w*, \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w provoke|strong="H7264"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* secure; \w Into|strong="H3027"\w* whose \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* bringeth \add abundantly\add*.

But \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* beasts, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* they \w shall|strong="H8064"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w thee|strong="H7592"\w*; \w And|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w of|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* they \w shall|strong="H8064"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w thee|strong="H7592"\w*:

\w Or|strong="H5608"\w* \w speak|strong="H7878"\w* \w to|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* it \w shall|strong="H3220"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee; \w And|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shall|strong="H3220"\w* \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* \w unto|strong="H3220"\w* thee.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w*, \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*,

\w In|strong="H5315"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w thing|strong="H2416"\w*, \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w mankind|strong="H1320"\w*?

Doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* ear try \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w Even|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H2441"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w palate|strong="H2441"\w* \w tasteth|strong="H2938"\w* \w its|strong="H4405"\w* food?

\w With|strong="H3117"\w* \w aged|strong="H3453"\w* \w men|strong="H3453"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w length|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

\w With|strong="H5973"\w* \add God\add* \w is|strong="H2451"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w might|strong="H1369"\w*; \w He|strong="H8394"\w* \w hath|strong="H8394"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* breaketh \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, \w and|strong="H1129"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w again|strong="H1129"\w*; \w He|strong="H3808"\w* shutteth \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, \w and|strong="H1129"\w* there \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w opening|strong="H6605"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w withholdeth|strong="H6113"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* they \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*; \w Again|strong="H7971"\w*, \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sendeth|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* they \w overturn|strong="H2015"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* earth.

\w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w is|strong="H8454"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H8454"\w*; \w The|strong="H5973"\w* \w deceived|strong="H7683"\w* \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w deceiver|strong="H7686"\w* \w are|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3212"\w* \w leadeth|strong="H3212"\w* \w counselors|strong="H3289"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w stripped|strong="H7758"\w*, \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* maketh \w he|strong="H3212"\w* \w fools|strong="H1984"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4428"\w* \w looseth|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* \w bond|strong="H4148"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H4428"\w* bindeth their \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* girdle.

\w He|strong="H3212"\w* \w leadeth|strong="H3212"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w stripped|strong="H7758"\w*, \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w overthroweth|strong="H5557"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* mighty.

\w He|strong="H8193"\w* removeth \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w speech|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* trusty, \w And|strong="H2205"\w* \w taketh|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w understanding|strong="H2940"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w poureth|strong="H8210"\w* contempt \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w princes|strong="H5081"\w*, \w And|strong="H5921"\w* looseth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w belt|strong="H4206"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* strong.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w uncovereth|strong="H1540"\w* \w deep|strong="H6013"\w* \w things|strong="H1540"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w bringeth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* light \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6757"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w death|strong="H6757"\w*.

He \w increaseth|strong="H7679"\w* \w the|strong="H5148"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* he destroyeth \w them|strong="H5148"\w*: He \w enlargeth|strong="H7849"\w* \w the|strong="H5148"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* he \w leadeth|strong="H5148"\w* \w them|strong="H5148"\w* captive.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* taketh \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w chiefs|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* earth, \w And|strong="H5971"\w* causeth \w them|strong="H8582"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w wander|strong="H8582"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H8414"\w* \w where|strong="H3808"\w* there \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w grope|strong="H4959"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w dark|strong="H2822"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* light; \w And|strong="H2822"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* maketh \w them|strong="H8582"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w stagger|strong="H8582"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drunken|strong="H7910"\w* \w man|strong="H7910"\w*.
